name: Circle Survivors
description:
You are under attack by an endless horde of circles. Fight them off and try to survive as long as possible!

Hint: You must hit at least 3 enemies of the same color, then hit a different color to trigger an explosion. Try to hit at least 5 enemies of the same color, in order to trigger a powerful explosion.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Click - Shoot
